sentences.en: Allow the sleeve flange to return to its original position.
sentences.cn: 允许套管法兰回到它的初始位置.

sentences.en: An electrified wire can be strung along the outer edges of this flange.
sentences.cn: 在外缘引上一条通了电的电线.

sentences.en: Both flange and web exhibited satisfactory elongation characteristics ( i . e . 28 % ).
sentences.cn: 翼缘和腹板都有令人满意的延伸率 ( 即28% ).

sentences.en: Disconnect the gauge glasses or fit a blind flange between them.
sentences.cn: 拆开水位玻璃管或者在两者之间装上盖板.

sentences.en: Exposed flange faces and pipe threads shall be protected from chemical solutions.
sentences.cn: 暴露的法兰面和管螺纹应保护好,以避免受到化学溶剂的腐蚀.

sentences.en: F 250 Flange is used in main bearing of KENT grinding machine series.
sentences.cn: F250法兰用于建德磨床系列机床主轴使用.

sentences.en: Flange hole inside the tube must be chamfered hole welding.
sentences.cn: 法兰内孔管件内孔必须倒角焊接.

sentences.en: Low pressure drop. Micrometer adjustment. Flanged with threaded companion flange.
sentences.cn: 具有低压降,可微调, 配有法兰等产品特点.

sentences.en: Lug body available with ISO flange dimensions and metric bolt hole threads.
sentences.cn: 凸耳式阀体符合ISO法兰尺寸和公制螺栓孔螺纹.

sentences.en: Molded - in liner fully supported by valve body at flange seals.
sentences.cn: 模铸进的衬垫被整体固定在阀体的法兰密封处.

sentences.en: Professional flange designed to remove dirt floor and walls.
sentences.cn: 专业翻边设计能去除地板与墙角污垢.

sentences.en: Small rectangular backup bars were used to fabricate the web - bottom flange connection.
sentences.cn: 在腹板与下翼缘的施焊中使用小矩形挡板.

sentences.en: These include gusset plates welded to the flange.
sentences.cn: 这些包括焊接到翼缘上的节点板.

sentences.en: Three structures have exhibited cracking at the ends of flange gusset plates.
sentences.cn: 已有三个结构在翼缘节点板端部出现了裂纹.

sentences.en: Within the family, small diameter pipes, also low pressure, see flange connection.
sentences.cn: 在家庭内, 管道直径小, 而且是低压, 看不见法兰连接.

phrases.tran_cn: 栓结法兰；联接法兰；螺栓结合凸缘
法兰接头；法兰联接；凸缘联接
法兰宽度；凸缘宽度；轮级宽度

trans.tran_en: the flat edge that stands out from an object such as a railway wheel, to keep it in the right position or strengthen it
